Welcome to a crash course on Linear Mixed Models (LMMs)! There are slight variations in the naming conventions of LMMs, you may encounter Linear Mixed Efffect Models, Mixed Models, Mixed Effect Models, rest assured, these all refer to the same concept that we will be going through today.

Before we proceed, this introduction assumes that the reader has:

1. Basics in Statistics in Psychology
  - Specifically Regression Analysis and Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)
2. Basics of R language
3. Basics of Data Structure and Organization

If you are not knowledgeable in these areas, it is highly recommended that you brush up on these skills before attempting this course.
